summary: "Ni Pour, Ni Contre" tracks the fall of a young TV camerawoman, Caty, after she becomes involved with a group of petty criminals and their enigmatic leader, Jean. The gang lives ... See full summary »
cast: Marie Gillain|Vincent Elbaz|Simon Abkarian|Zinedine Soualem|Dimitri Storoge|Natacha Lindinger|Jocelyn Lagarrigue|Pierre-Ange Le Pogam|Diane Kruger|Thierry Levaret|Michaël Abiteboul|Robert Plagnol|Michaël Tissier|Didier Menin|Thierry Flamand|Cédric Klapisch|Marie Chevalier|Tiffany Breuvart|Esse Lawson|Igor Skreblin|Hocine Choutri|Camille Natta|Aline Chaud|Patrick Colucci|Laurent Besançon|Jacques Gallo|Frédérique Gautier|Beatrix Malthys|Clara Pirali|Pierrette Santiago|Maud Skaky|Sylvaine Stefano|Hayley Gibbs|Kirsty White|Christelle Celas|Nabil Massad|Jean-François Theresin|Jean-Marie Ghanassin|Didier Perthuis|Laurette Paturel|Léo Pizzel|Lorenzo Castillo|André Bernard|Frankie Pain|Patty Pain|Laetitia Kelmayer|Thierry Cazals|Karim Clémenceau|Stéphanie Montreux
title: Ni a favor ni en contra (sino todo lo contrario)
